title: HiMont Kids Camera Instant Print, Digital Camera for Kids with No Ink Print Paper & 32G TF Card, Selfie Video Camera with Color Pens for DIY, Fun Gift for Girls Boys 3-14 Years Old (Pink)
features: [BEST DIY CAMERA GIFT FOR KIDS] This kids camera is both a digital camera and an instant print camera for kids which allows kids to take color images, record 1080p HD videos and print black&white photos. Moreover, this instant print camera also comes with 3 cutes cartoon stickers, 5 colored pens for DIY to stimulate children’s imagination and creativity. Fun Birthday/Christmas/Daily gift for kids age 3-14.

[NO INK INSTANT PRINT CAMERA FOR KIDS] This kids instant camera adopts advanced no ink technology to print without toner. Kids can instantly freeze and print images on 2.16*3.15inch (5.5*8cm) skin-friendly paper in seconds with a simple press. (3 Rolls Print Paper for up to 150 photos are included in the package)

[20MP DUAL LENS DIGITAL CAMERA FOR KIDS] This HiMont children's camera is equipped with 20MP front and rear dual lenses, which can take photos and videos anytime and anywhere even when there is no printing paper. Under the photo and video functions, high-definition color images and 1080P videos will be automatically saved in the 32G memory card. It also has 10X digital zoom function. (32G memory card is included in the package)

[MULTIFUNCTIONAL & EASY TO OPERATE] This kids camera has 6 functions, such as color photography, high-definition video, black & white printing, music, playback and games, which allows your kids to operate easily and have fun. Moreover, In order to help your child better record every meaningful moment of their childhood, the camera also has built-in 6 kinds of color filters, 20 kinds of cartoon photo frames & characters, etc., and supports continuous shooting, timer shooting and other functions.

[PRIVACY SAFE & USB TRANSFER] To better protect the privacy of you and your children, this instant camera for children only supports file transfer via USB cable. In order to better preserve the precious moments you have taken, it is recommended to regularly back up the files in the camera to a computer for storage.
description: Product Description Kind Tips 1. Please fully charge the children's camera before use! Please make sure the input is DC 5V/1A! If the battery cannot be charged and turned on due to battery protection, the charging time will be extended. 2. The included 32GB SD card is pre-installed in the camera! 3. In order to get a better printing effect, you can adjust the printing density of the camera according to the light conditions! 4. Printing paper installation. please make sure that the paper roll is installed in the correct direction, because only one side of the paper roll has printing function! PACKAGE LIST 1 x Kids Instant Camera 3 x Print Paper Roll 1 x 32GB Memory Card 1 x USB Charging Cable 5 x Colored pens 3 x Cute Cartoon Stickers 1 x Neck Lanyard 1 x User Manual 1 x Product Box HiMont Children's Digital & Instant Print Camera "Every child will grow up, and if I can, I would like to record every moment of happiness in childhood." This kids camera is like a cute friend to accompany children to explore the world. Record every meaningful moment of children's childhood, feel the fun of taking pictures and photography, develop creativity and improve hands-on ability. Dual Lens & Self Timer This HiMont children's camera is equipped with 12MP front and rear dual lenses, which allows children to take multiple angles of views. The continuous shooting and timer shooting will help kids freeze every wonderful moment of your party, activities and trip. Multiple Funny Filters & Photo Frame Effects In order to help your child better record every meaningful moment of their childhood, the camera has built-in 6 kinds of color filters, 20 kinds of cartoon photo frames & characters, etc. Zero Ink or Toner Print Paper This kids instant camera adopts advanced zero ink technology to print without toner. The printing paper is made of virgin wood pulp, without any harmful ingredients, safe, durable, easy to tear, support direct thermal clearly printing, no ink or toner required , simple, fast and efficient printing.
